title: Our Specialities
cleaned_text: Our Specialities Discover our specialities and the many therapeutic tools deriving from natural medicines that we are pleased to offer you. Our News [Seasonal depression](http://www.pharmaciedesbanques.ch/en/seasonal-depression/) What is « seasonal depression » and how to address it ? [Preventing the flu](http://www.pharmaciedesbanques.ch/en/preventing-the-flu/) A point on our most efficient flu prevention strategies. [Winter protection](http://www.pharmaciedesbanques.ch/en/winter-protection/) All our tricks to support your immune system this winter. Free service available throughout the city of Geneva (12 CHF outside Geneva). We welcome you from Monday to Friday from 08:30 to 19:00 and on
